TestDescription.name: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Open Flash Chart
TestDescription.Description: Open Flash Chart is an open source project which helps developers to add beautiful charts to their web pages or applications. A cross site scripting vulnerability was reported in older versions of the Open Flash Chart library that may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary Javascript code.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Open Flash Chart.

Reference.database: Open Flash Chart 'get-data' Parameter Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
